featured.text: The greening of airports is just one of these attempts.
Instead of punishing Willig, the city treated him as a hero who attempted the impossible and met the challenge. 34.
In the past, flashing red lights and even lion faces have been unsuccessfully trialed in an attempt to keep deer off the tracks.
Dooley attempts to save the old man by a ritual learned from comic books: killing a turtle and trading his soul for Grandfather’s.

definition.en_def: To make an effort to do something.
definition.example: She decided to attempt the difficult puzzle.
